getStateDescriptor() - Method in interface com.rift.coad.daemon.hsqldb.HsqlDBEngineMBean
Retrieves a character sequence describing this server's current state, including the message of the last exception, if there is one and it is still in context.

HsqlDBEngineException - Exception in com.rift.coad.daemon.hsqldb
This exception will get thrown when there is an error while dealing with the HSQLDB Engine.
